Name: 箱庭小相撲
About the game: This is a sumo wrestling simulation game. The Hakoniwa Sumo Kyokai will be held in the computer you are using now, and you will be able to play Grand Sumo Tournament six times a year. Also you will be able to play the tournament called Gachinko Cup once every four years. You will be the master of the room and warmly watch over the disciples.

Meta Description: Looking for information on 箱庭小相撲? Check out the release date (Jun 27, 2020), developer insights from Shin Tomura, and a complete game summary.
